Description: THE customisation mod for TOS2! Credits to MysticMismagius and Harry James Potter for the icons and mod ideas and Pat for coding help!

CheckboxSettings.Name: Dump Sprite Sheets
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether game sprite sheets are dumped so pack debugging is possible.

SliderSettings.Name: Silhouette Animation Duration
SliderSettings.Description: Dictates how long should one iteration of an animation last for.
